;

;

;

;

;

;17. Flash - .flv, .fla
;

;Business office 2007 has new file extensions. The 2007 Microsoft Workplace method introduces a new file format that is based on XML. It is called Open XML Formats.

;

;
;Word supports a DOCX format (macro-free of charge document) and a DOCM format (document that permits macros). Administrators can handle the use of these formats by Group Policy.
